verbs.description: [ARG0: red sox] win world series [V: defeating] [ARG1: dodgers] [ARGM-EXT: 5 - 1] [ARGM-LOC: in game 5] the boston red sox won their fourth world series championship in 15 years beating the los angeles dodgers 5 - 1 in game 5 sunday night behind david price pitching and steve pearce power dodgers alex cora boston red sox david price j d martinez clayton kershaw red sox mookie betts david price british politician los angeles dodgers steve pearce los angeles puerto rico dodger stadium
